document.full_text: the average price for a gallon of gasoline in the united states has moved closer to $4, jumping more than 19 cents since mid-march to a level less than 10 percent below its all-time high, a widely followed survey said on sunday.
document.title: gallon of gas jumps to $3.76: survey
lines_and_colors: the average price for a gallon of gasoline in the united states has moved closer to $4, jumping more than 19 cents since mid-march to a level less than 10 percent below its all-time high, a widely followed survey said on sunday.
